Klasse LibrarySystem

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.librarySystem.logic.LibrarySystem
public class LibrarySystem extends Object
The LibrarySystem class manages books, people, and book lending in a library.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    LibrarySystem()
    Constructor for creating a LibrarySystem object.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • LibrarySystem

      public LibrarySystem()
      Constructor for creating a LibrarySystem object.

  • Methodendetails

    • getPersons

      public List<Person> getPersons()

    • getBooks

      public List<Book> getBooks()

    • getBorrowBookPersons

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getBorrowBookPersons()

    • addBook

      public Book addBook(Book book)
      Adds a book to the library system if it is not already present.
      Parameter:
      book - the book to be added
      Gibt zurück:
      the added book if successful, or null if the book is null or already exists in the LibrarySystem

    • editBook

      public boolean editBook(int bookId, String title, String author, String genre)
      Updates the details of a book, identified by its ID.
      Parameter:
      bookId - the ID of the book to edit
      title - the new title of the book
      author - the new author of the book
      genre - the new genre of the book
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the book was found and updated, false otherwise

    • deleteBook

      public void deleteBook(Book book)
      Removes a book from the library system if it is not borrowed.
      Parameter:
      book - the book to be removed

    • addPerson

      public Person addPerson(Person person)
      Adds a new person to the LibrarySystem.
      Parameter:
      person - the person to be added
      Gibt zurück:
      the added person, or null if the person is already in the system or is null

    • editPerson

      public boolean editPerson(int personId, String firstName, String lastName, LocalDate birthDate, Address address)
      Updates the details of a person, identified by their ID.
      Parameter:
      personId - the ID of the person to edit
      firstName - the new first name
      lastName - the new last name
      birthDate - the new birthdate
      address - the new address
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the person was found and updated, false otherwise

    • deletePerson

      public void deletePerson(Person person)
      Removes a person from the system if they have no outstanding fees and no borrowed books.
      Parameter:
      person - the person to be removed

    • borrowBook

      public boolean borrowBook(Book book, Person person)
      Allows a person to borrow a book if it is available.
      Parameter:
      book - the book to be borrowed
      person - the person borrowing the book
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the book was successfully borrowed, false otherwise

    • gaveBookBack

      public boolean gaveBookBack(Book book, Person person, boolean isNowDamaged)
      Handles the return of a borrowed book and applies fees if necessary.
      Parameter:
      book - the book being returned
      person - the person returning the book
      isNowDamaged - true if the book is returned damaged, false otherwise
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the return was successful, false otherwise

    • wasErrorLogged

      public boolean wasErrorLogged()
      Checks if an error was logged during the borrowing or returning process.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if an error occurred, false otherwise

    • calculateFeeForBook

      public double calculateFeeForBook(Book book, boolean isNowDamaged)
      Calculates the late fee for a returned book based on its return date and condition.
      Parameter:
      book - the book being returned
      isNowDamaged - true if the book is now damaged, false otherwise
      Gibt zurück:
      the calculated fee

    • filterPersons

      public List<Person> filterPersons(PersonFilter personFilter)
      Filters persons based on the given criteria.
      Parameter:
      personFilter - the filter containing criteria for filtering persons
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of persons matching the filter criteria

    • filterBooks

      public List<Book> filterBooks(BookFilter bookFilter)
      Filters books based on the given criteria.
      Parameter:
      bookFilter - the filter containing criteria for filtering books
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of books matching the filter criteria

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      toString in Klasse Object
